payment_screen_texts.working_hour_note: Doctor usually respond within 5 minutes. Not for emergency use.
payment_screen_texts.non_working_hour_note: You're starting a consultation outside the doctor's working hours. Please expect a delayed response.

retarget_user_notifications.title: Payment not complete. Please retry.
retarget_user_notifications.message: Your payment was unsuccessful, please try again. Click here to continue.

retarget_user_notifications.message: Complete your payment to get connected with your doctor and address your health query

retarget_user_notifications.message: Describe your health issue & get connected to top doctors in less than 5 minutes.

retarget_user_notifications.title: Ignoring your health?
retarget_user_notifications.message: Tell us your symptoms & get health issues resolved instantly. Get connected to top doctors in less than 60 seconds

patient_quick_messages: Could you please explain in detail?
Are there any side effects of the medicines?
How can I stop this issue from happening again?
patient_video_intro_messages: You can now request for a video call with the doctor.
Please make sure you are in a well-lit, quiet place.
Your internet connectivity should be stable.
Please ensure you are dressed appropriately.
patient_audio_intro_messages: Please confirm with the doctor if he/she is free to receive the call.
You can make maximum of 3 calls in one consultation.
Audio calls are unavailable between 9 pm to 9 am. You can place a request for a video call instead, by clicking on the video icon.
You will not be charged for this call.

national.description: Incase you forgot to ask something

payment_screen_tips.text: 93% of users found online consultation helpful
Consultation will happen only on mobile app

payment_summary_disclaimer: Practo Guarantee: 100% Money back if no response
The contents of your consultations are private and confidential. Practo's team of doctors may
carry out routine anonymised audits to improve service quality. T&C apply
payment_summary_disclaimer_international: HIPAA compliant data centers · 100% Money back if no response
